Posts.Content: Nov 18, 2013 06:50PM chegushe wrote: Hi everyone, Im posting on behalf of my mom who is triple negative stage 4 with mets in her bones, liver and now LMD. the LMD came to us as a shock because she was doing so well on the chemo for her systemic mets (which are stable and somewhat improved). so now they plan on putting an ommaya port and starting her on intra thecal topotecan. ive always got a lot of hope and inspiration from breastcancer.org and i am back for some more. Any of u guys had any experience with IT topotecan? ive read about a lot of women on xeloda but i dont think moms neuro onc is in favor of it as the only form of treatment for the LMD (even tho my mom previously went into remission when she was on xeloda) my moms been fighting this crappy disease since 1989 and it keeps coming back to haunt us :(
Posts.Title: Leptomeningeal Metastases or Carcinomatous meningitis in Brain mandymoo mike3121
